Package kueres.media

Class MediaService

java.lang.Object
kueres.eventbus.EventSubscriber
kueres.media.MediaService
@Service
public class MediaService
extends EventSubscriber
The MediaService provides services needed by the MediaController.
Since:
Feb 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu
